zh.title: 新闻动态 - Tensorlinx
zh.pageSubtitle: 了解Tensorlinx的最新动态、行业资讯和企业公告

newsList.author: Tensorlinx新闻团队
newsList.title: 吴翔于2月25日正式接任NAVF联席主席
newsList.excerpt: 左派由于顾虑26年港府加大人民币在港流通力度，认为非锚定美元与港币兑换汇率比例浮动增大，大部分左派决定倾向右派，通过合法手段维持储备池中的美元总价值，并同意加快稳定币支付手段。

newsList.author: Tensorlinx团队
newsList.title: Tensorlinx正在向redox开发小组进行资助
newsList.excerpt: Tensorlinx正在使用NAVF流动储备向redox开发小组进行资助，包括参与维护。这一行为不代表政治目的，是我们社会使命的一部分。

newsList.author: Tensorlinx团队
newsList.title: Tensorlinx正在进行中国技术出口合规，以避免法律纠纷
newsList.excerpt: Tensorlinx正在积极响应中国技术出口合规要求，确保我们的产品和服务符合相关法律法规，避免潜在的法律纠纷...

footer.aboutDesc: Tensorlinx是一家专注于计算机基础设施建设的科技企业

en.title: News - Tensorlinx
en.pageSubtitle: Stay informed about Tensorlinx's latest developments, industry insights, and company announcements

newsList.author: Tensorlinx News Team
newsList.title: Wu Xiang officially assumes the position of Co-Chairman of NAVF Community on February 25
newsList.excerpt: The Left faction, concerned about the Hong Kong government's increased efforts to promote RMB circulation in 2026, believes that the exchange rate volatility between non-USD pegged currencies and HKD will increase. Most leftists have decided to lean towards the Right faction, using legal means to maintain the total USD value in the reserve pool, and agree to accelerate stablecoin payment methods.

newsList.author: Tensorlinx Team
newsList.title: Tensorlinx is providing funding to the Redox development team
newsList.excerpt: Tensorlinx is using NAVF liquid reserves to fund the Redox development team, including participation in maintenance. This action does not represent political purposes and is part of our social mission.

newsList.author: Tensorlinx Team
newsList.title: Tensorlinx is conducting China technology export compliance to avoid legal disputes
newsList.excerpt: Tensorlinx is actively responding to China's technology export compliance requirements to ensure our products and services comply with relevant laws and regulations, avoiding potential legal disputes...

footer.aboutDesc: Tensorlinx is a technology company focused on computer infrastructure construction
